org.sangraama.assets

Class AbsPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sangraama.assets.AbsPlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DummyPlayer, Player

    public abstract class AbsPlayer
extends Object
    ************************************************************************** This class contains abstract interface for Player and dummy player classes.
    Version:
    : v1.2

        userID - Plater User ID
        x - x coordination of the player
        y - y coordination of the player
        w - width of the AOI
        h - height of the AOI

        Returns:

      • isInsideTotalMap

        protected boolean isInsideTotalMap(float x,
                       float y)
        Check whether given location (the virtual point to be set) it inside the total map
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinates of the location
        y - y coordinates of the location
        Returns:
        true if it's inside the map, otherwise false

      • reqInterestIn

        public abstract void reqInterestIn(float x,
                 float y)
        Request for client's Area of Interest around player. When player wants to fulfill it's Area of Interest, it will ask for the updates of that area. This method checked in following sequence, 1) check on own sub-tile 2) check whether location is inside current 3) check for the server which own that location and send connection tag
        Parameters:
        x - x coordination of interest location
        y - y coordination of interest location

      • sendPassConnectionInfo

        Parameters:
        transferReq - List of Objects inherited from SendProtocol class

        Parameters:

      • sendSyncData

        public abstract void sendSyncData(List<SendProtocol> syncData)
        Player and Dummy Player should have different implementation of sync data Ex: player x ,y coordinates which dummy doesn't have
        Parameters:
        syncData - List of Objects inherited from SendProtocol class

      • sendTileSizeInfo

        public void sendTileSizeInfo()
